{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12987v1", "title": "Global regularity for the Dirichlet problem of Monge-Ampère equation
  in convex polytopes", "summary": "We study the Dirichlet problem for Monge-Amp\`ere equation in bounded convex
polytopes. We give sharp conditions for the existence of global $C^2$ and
$C^{2,\alpha}$ convex solutions provided that a global $C^2$, convex
subsolution exists.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-17T14:50:08Z"}
